lab5

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab5.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    Main Controller

    This is the main controller, and is concerned with taking the users start/stop simulation input and passing it on to the sub controllers, such as temp, humid etc.
    It then takes input from the sub controllers in order to update the main view.
    Since:
    2016-04-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Withams

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(TempController tempController,
          HumidityController humidityController,
          MoistureController moistureController,
          MainView mainView)

        Constructor

        Takes sub controllers and main view as parameters and assigns them to variables.
        Also sets the simulation boolean to the default false value, and tries to create the saved settings directory in case it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        tempController -
        humidityController -
        moistureController -
        mainView -

    • Method Detail

      • startSimulation

        public void startSimulation()

        Start Simulation

        When the start button is clicked, the simulation is started by calling the sub controller start methods.
        If the simulation is already running, a pop up is displayed.

      • stopSimulation

        public void stopSimulation()

        Stop Simulation

        When the stop button is clicked the simulation is stopped by calling the sub controller stop methods.
        If the simulaion is already stopped, a pop up is displayed.

      • setTempSettings

        public void setTempSettings()

        Display Temperature Settings Dialog

        When the user clicks the temperature settings, a input field dialog is displayed.

      • saveTempSettings

        public void saveTempSettings()

        Save Temperature Settings, Close Dialog

        When the save button is clicked, try save settings and close dialog
